metadata.title: CVE-2022-45145 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: egg-compile.scm in CHICKEN 5.x before 5.3.1 allows arbitrary OS commandexecution during package installation via escape characters in a .egg file.

criterions.comment: chicken: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
